name: Ponyta
flavorText:
Its hooves are 10
times harder than
diamonds. It can trample anything
completely flat
in little time.

previous.name: Golem
previous.flavorText:
Its boulder-like
body is extremely
hard. It can easily withstand
dynamite blasts
without damage.

next.name: Rapidash
next.flavorText:
Very competitive,
this POKéMON will
chase anything that moves fast
in the hopes of
racing it.
